title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 03 August 2012 - XWiki
content:

15:18 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
15:31 <polx> has quit  
15:38 <kwoot> has joined #xwiki  
15:39 <kwoot> hi guys. Long time no see :-) Are you aware that the pricing page for support on xwiki.com does not work correctly?  
15:52 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
15:54 <+sburjan> kwoot: hello. what do you mean not working correctly ?  
15:56 <kwoot> wel, When I click on pricing only the tab changes, but not the text. Tested on linux/chrome/firefox, windows/ie/firefox.  
15:57 <+sburjan> thanks, it seems someone is working on the page, updating it. sorry for the inconvenience  
15:59 <kwoot> No problem. There is always IRC :-)  
15:59 <+sburjan> kwoot: could you please give me the link ?  
15:59 <kwoot> sure: http://www.xwiki.com/xwiki/bin/view/Offer/Support?tab=tabber-header4&tabberIds=tabber-header#tabber-header4  
16:01 <+sburjan> hmm.. odd, the content of the tabs changes when I switch tab  
16:05 <kwoot> that is weird. what are you using?  
16:12 <+sburjan> Ubuntu 12.04 and latest Firefox  
16:12 <kwoot> hm, Here 10.04 LTS (I know :-) and Firefox 14.  
16:18 <+sburjan> try clearing you cache maybe ...  
16:18 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
16:20 <kwoot> has left #xwiki  
16:23 <kwoot> has joined #xwiki  
16:23 <kwoot> had a network hickup :-)  
16:27 <polx> has quit  
16:28 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
16:30 <CIA-114> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* r82d2074 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/82d2074a34cc29da58703b999b1dd773f286ea92 / (5 files in 5 dirs): XWIKI-6377: problem with russian encoding in office import app - https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/82d2074a34cc29da58703b999b1dd773f286ea92  
17:02 <kwoot> has left #xwiki  
17:15 <npm\_> has quit  
17:18 <npm> has joined #xwiki  
17:29 <ssavi> has joined #xwiki  
17:41 <CIA-114> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* r2e5c2b9 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/2e5c2b973785cedf687fed25202b01718ff2f5f5 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/internal/export/OfficeExporter.java : XWIKI-8007: OpenOffice exporter breaks document charset rendering non-Latin text non-readable - https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/2e5c2b973785cedf687fed25202b01718ff2f5f5  
17:52 <+mflorea> sdumitriu: ping  
18:10 <@sdumitriu> Pong  
18:12 <+mflorea> I see you forked jodconverter. I want to make 1-2 pull requests and then release a version for us. Should we use your fork?  
18:13 <@sdumitriu> Yes  
18:13 <+mflorea> ok  
18:22 <pgmjsd> has quit  
18:25 <+mflorea> sdumitriu: did you manage to build it?  
18:25 <@sdumitriu> Hm...  
18:25 <@sdumitriu> I know I was having some troubles with that  
18:26 <+mflorea> there are two tests failing  
18:26 <@sdumitriu> Yes, I know about those  
18:27 <+mflorea> one is for sigarProcessManager, and apparently is failing because I don't have libsigar-amd64-linux.so in java.library.path  
18:28 <pgmjsd> has joined #xwiki  
18:28 <+mflorea> and the other one runAllPossibleConversions, and it fails because it can't connect to the open office server  
18:29 <+mflorea> actually both are caused by the same missing library  
18:29 <@sdumitriu> mflorea: I just ran a clean install, and it succeeded  
18:30 <@sdumitriu> I have sigar locally  
18:30 <+mflorea> it means you have the missing lib  
18:30 <+mflorea> I need it too then  
18:31 <ssavi> has quit  
18:31 <@sdumitriu> mflorea: You should have commit rights on my fork  
18:32 <+mflorea> hmm, should I commit directly or create pull requests and apply them myself? :)  
18:33 <@sdumitriu> Commit directly  
18:34 <@sdumitriu> You should create issues first, though  
18:34 <+mflorea> ok, how do I associate commits to issues?  
18:34 <@sdumitriu> (not XWIKI issues)  
18:34 <+mflorea> sure  
18:34 <@sdumitriu> Issue #5:  
18:34 <+mflorea> ok, in the commit log  
18:34 <@sdumitriu> #n I believe does the trick  
18:35 <sburjan> has quit
